descr: "A structured set of questions intended to guide the collection of answers from end-users. Questionnaires provide detailed control over order, presentation, phraseology and grouping to allow coherent, consistent data collection."

fields.name: linkId
fields.descr: "An identifier that is unique within the Questionnaire allowing linkage to the equivalent item in a QuestionnaireResponse resource."

fields.name: definition
fields.descr:
"A reference to an [[[ElementDefinition]]] that provides the details for the item. If a definition is provided, then the following element values can be inferred from the definition: 

* code (ElementDefinition.code)
* type (ElementDefinition.type)
* required (ElementDefinition.min)
* repeats (ElementDefinition.max)
* maxLength (ElementDefinition.maxLength)
* options (ElementDefinition.binding)

Any information provided in these elements on a Questionnaire Item overrides the information from the definition."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "A terminology code that corresponds to this group or question (e.g. a code from LOINC, which defines many questions and answers)."

fields.name: prefix
fields.descr: "A short label for a particular group, question or set of display text within the questionnaire used for reference by the individual completing the questionnaire."

fields.name: text
fields.descr: "The name of a section, the text of a question or text content for a display item."

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "The type of questionnaire item this is - whether text for display, a grouping of other items or a particular type of data to be captured (string, integer, coded choice, etc.)."

fields.name: enableWhen
fields.descr: "A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true."

fields.name: required
fields.descr: "An indication, if true, that the item must be present in a \"completed\" QuestionnaireResponse.  If false, the item may be skipped when answering the questionnaire."

fields.name: repeats
fields.descr: "An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups."

fields.name: readOnly
fields.descr: "An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire."

fields.name: maxLength
fields.descr: "The maximum number of characters that are permitted in the answer to be considered a \"valid\" QuestionnaireResponse."

fields.name: options
fields.descr: "A reference to a value set containing a list of codes representing permitted answers for a \"choice\" or \"open-choice\" question."

fields.name: option
fields.descr: "One of the permitted answers for a \"choice\" or \"open-choice\" question."

fields.name: initialBoolean
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialDecimal
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialInteger
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialDate
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialDateTime
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialTime
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialString
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialUri
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialAttachment
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialCoding
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialQuantity
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: initialReference
fields.descr: "The value that should be defaulted when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input."

fields.name: item
fields.descr: "Text, questions and other groups to be nested beneath a question or group."

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."
 derived from Element
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."
